SEARCH
Package driver

Class DriverCtrlDomain

java.lang.Object
driver.DriverCtrlDomain
public class DriverCtrlDomain extends Object
DriverCtrlDomain de la classe CtrlDomain, classe controladora del domini. Aquest driver permet executar les funcionalitats de la classe CtrlDomain.
